trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityClassGenerator.OnPropertyGenerated"></xref> event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PropertyGeneratedEventArgs"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PropertyGeneratedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified property source, backing field name, and return type.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem"></xref> object that is the source of the property.
The name of the field that backs the property.
The base type of the property.
Gets a `List(CodeAttributeDeclaration)` of attributes that will be added to the property.
The attributes are added after the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityClassGenerator.OnPropertyGenerated> event is raised.
A collection that contains the attributes that will be added to the property.
The collection is empty if no attributes will be added.
Gets a `List(CodeStatement)` containing the get statements to be added to the property.
The `List(CodeStatement)` is used to specify statements to add to the get accessor of the property.
The statements are inserted after the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityClassGenerator.OnPropertyGenerated> event is raised.
A collection that contains the get statements to be added to the property.
Gets a `List(CodeStatement)` containing the set statements to be added to the property.
The `List(CodeStatement)` is used to specify statements to add to the set accessor of the property.
The statements are inserted after the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityClassGenerator.OnPropertyGenerated> event is raised.
A collection that contains the set statements to be added to the property.
Gets the name of the field that backs the property.
The name of the field that backs the property.
This can be `null` for navigation properties.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem"></xref> object that is the source of the property.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem"></xref> object that is the source of the property.
Gets or sets the type of the property.
This property returns the common language runtime (CLR) equivalent type of the property.
It can also be used to specify a new base type.
This property applies only to navigation properties.
The type of the property.
